patterns.comment: Parse text node in block mode.
patterns.name: meta.body.block.tiddlywiki5

patterns.comment: Parse text node in inline mode.
patterns.name: meta.body.inline.tiddlywiki5

patterns.comment: Treat nearest non-whitespace line as template tiddler title.
Treat nearest non-whitespace line as template tiddler title.

patterns.match:
(?x)
^
(?:
  (\^(?:[^^]|\^\^)) |  # Top alignment marker
  (\,(?:[^,]|\,\,))    # Bottom alignment marker
)?
([ \t]*)                 # Left alignment marker
(!)               # Heading cell marker
(.*?)                     # Cell contents
([ \t]*)                 # Right alignment marker
$
patterns.name: heading.th.meta.cell.tiddlywiki5

patterns.match:
(?x)
^
(?:
  (\^(?:[^^]|\^\^)) |  # Top alignment marker
  (\,(?:[^,]|\,\,))    # Bottom alignment marker
)?
([ \t]*)                 # Left alignment marker
()               # Heading cell marker
(.*?)                     # Cell contents
([ \t]*)                 # Right alignment marker
$
patterns.name: data.td.meta.cell.tiddlywiki5
